official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States code to provide for a pension of $100 per month for unremarried widows of men awarded a Medal of Honor posthumously.

summary.text: Provides for a pension of $100 per month for unremarried widows of men awarded a Medal of Honor posthumously. States that such pension shall be paid in addition to all other payments under laws of the United States and shall not be subject to attachment, execution, levy, tax, lien or detention. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 563)
